name: oath_of_the_gatewatch_superset
description: Huge OGW-themed package: Surge, Support, Cohort, Devoid, Colorless-matters, C-symbol costs, Allies, Eldrazi Scions, Wastes, processors-lite, and colorless synergy.

Instant:
This spell is colorless. {DEVOID_REMINDER}
Exile target creature or planeswalker spell with mana value {SMALL_MV}. Its controller may draw a card.
Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast colorless spells or activate abilities of colorless permanents.
Target spell or permanent becomes colorless until end of turn. Draw a card.
Create two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens with "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
Until end of turn, colorless creatures you control get +{SMALL_NUM}/+{SMALL_NUM} and gain trample.

Surge {SURGE_COST} {SURGE_REMINDER}
Return target colorless permanent to its owner's hand.
Sorcery:
This spell is colorless. {DEVOID_REMINDER}
Search your library for a Wastes card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

This spell is colorless. {DEVOID_REMINDER}
Target player sacrifices a creature. If a colorless creature was sacrificed this way, you gain {SMALL_NUM} life and draw a card.
Create three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens with "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
Processor — As you cast this spell, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. When you do, draw two cards.

Surge {SURGE_COST} {SURGE_REMINDER}
Deal {BURN_X} damage divided as you choose among up to {TARGETS_X} targets.
Enchantment:
This enchantment is colorless. {DEVOID_REMINDER}
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

This enchantment is colorless. {DEVOID_REMINDER}
Colorless spells you cast cost {GENERIC_TAX} less to cast.
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token with "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
Artifact: {TAP}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast colorless spells.
{TAP}, Pay {C}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Colorless creatures you control have menace.
Equipment:
Equipped creature has "Pay {C}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
Equip {EQUIP_COST}
Activated: {C}: Target creature can't block this turn.
Pay {C}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target colorless creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
AuraCreature:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is colorless, gets +{SMALL_NUM}/+{SMALL_NUM}, and has menace.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Pay {C}: Scry 1" and "{C}, {TAP}: Draw a card, then discard a card."
Creature:
This creature is colorless. {DEVOID_REMINDER}
When this creature enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token with "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

This creature is colorless. {DEVOID_REMINDER}
Pay {C}: This creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

This creature is colorless. {DEVOID_REMINDER}
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

This creature is colorless. {DEVOID_REMINDER}
{C}{C}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

Instant:
Surge {SURGE_COST} {SURGE_REMINDER}
Exile target attacking creature. If this spell's surge cost was paid, you gain {SMALL_NUM} life.

Support {SUPPORT_N} {SUPPORT_REMINDER}
Untap up to {TARGETS_X} target creatures.
Prevent the next {PREVENT_X} damage that would be dealt to any number of targets this turn.
Sorcery:
Support {SUPPORT_N} {SUPPORT_REMINDER}
Create a 1/1 Kor Ally creature token for each creature you supported.
Return target creature card with mana value {SMALL_MV} or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Enchantment: Rally — Whenever this or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Colorless creatures you control have vigilance.
Creature: Cohort — {COHORT_COST}: Tap target creature an opponent controls.
Rally — Whenever this or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you gain {SMALL_NUM} life.
Activated: {C}, {TAP}: Tap target creature. You gain 1 life.

Instant:
Surge {SURGE_COST} {SURGE_REMINDER}
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {GENERIC_TAX}. If this spell's surge cost was paid, scry 2.
Return target creature to its owner's hand. If it's colorless, draw a card.
Target creature gets -{SMALL_NUM}/0 and loses all colors until end of turn. Draw a card.
Sorcery: Draw {DRAW_X} cards. If you cast another spell this turn, instead scry 2, then draw {DRAW_X_PLUS} cards.

Processor — As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into their graveyard. If you do, tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Enchantment: Whenever you cast a colorless spell, scry 1, then draw a card, then discard a card.

Devoid {DEVOID_REMINDER}

Instant: Target creature gets -{SMALL_NUM}/-{SMALL_NUM} until end of turn. If it's colorless, you gain {SMALL_NUM} life.

Destroy target creature with mana value {SMALL_MV} or less.
Sorcery: Processor — As you cast this spell, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into their graveyard. When you do, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

Pay {C}: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Surge {SURGE_COST} {SURGE_REMINDER}
This spell deals {BURN_SPLIT} damage divided as you choose among up to {TARGETS_X} targets.
Target creature can't block this turn. Support {SUPPORT_N}. {SUPPORT_REMINDER_SHORT}

Devoid {DEVOID_REMINDER}

Instant:
Support {SUPPORT_N} {SUPPORT_REMINDER}
Untap each creature that had a counter put on it this way.
Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. If you control a colorless creature, put a +1/+1 counter on your creature first.
Sorcery: Search your library for up to two basic land cards with different names, including Wastes, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Create two 0/1 colorless Plant creature tokens, then support {SUPPORT_N}. {SUPPORT_REMINDER_SHORT}
Enchantment: Colorless creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach.
Creature: Rally — Whenever this or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Cohort — {COHORT_COST}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Activated: {C}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast colorless spells or activate abilities of colorless permanents.

SURGE_REMINDER: (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
SUPPORT_REMINDER: (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to {SUPPORT_N} other target creatures.)
SUPPORT_REMINDER_SHORT: (Put a +1/+1 counter on up to {SUPPORT_N} other target creatures.)
COHORT_COST: Tap this and an untapped Ally you control
